deploy.startCommand: cd /app && echo 'Building shared package...' && pnpm --filter @syntera/shared build && echo 'Building chat service...' && cd services/chat && pnpm build && echo 'Verifying build...' && ls -la dist/ && test -f dist/index.js && echo 'Starting service...' && node dist/index.js || (echo 'ERROR: Build or start failed' && exit 1)
